TEXT.TITLE: ADVANCED TELECOMMUNICATIONS <ATEL.O> TO BUY CO
TEXT.BODY: Advanced Telecommunications Corp said it reached an agreement in principle to purchase <Teltec Savings Communications Co>, a long distance telephone service in Florida. The proposed acquisition price is approximately 17.5 mln dlrs in cash, the company said. Reuter
